attachments.title: Nintendo's Shigeru Miyamoto explaining World 1-1 is the best game design lesson of the week
attachments.text: The level design of Mario games often seems simple, while gradually and invisibly teaching the player what they should be doing and how they should be doing it. Ideas are introduced in a safe space,...
attachments.fallback: Polygon: Nintendo's Shigeru Miyamoto explaining World 1-1 is the best game design lesson of the week

text: "By being hit, you become bigger, and that makes you feel really happy"
